name: ListStatementsWithPagination
description:
Retrieve and list financial statements with pagination.

Use this tool to obtain a list of financial statements, supporting pagination for easier data management. It's helpful for users needing detailed or summarized financial records.

parameters.name: filter_from_date
parameters.description: Filter statements with end_date on or after this date. Use ISO8601 format (e.g., '2023-01-01').

value_schema.description: Filter statements with end_date on or after this date (ISO8601 format).

parameters.name: end_date_before
parameters.description: Filter statements with an end_date on or before this date (ISO8601 format). Defaults to the current time if not provided.

value_schema.description: Filter statements with end_date on or before this date (ISO8601 format). Defaults to current time.

parameters.name: pagination_start_id
parameters.description: ID of the last entity from the previous page to retrieve the next page.

value_schema.description: The ID of the last entity of the previous page, used for pagination to get the next page.

parameters.name: results_per_page
parameters.description: Specify the number of results per page. Must be between 2 and 100. Defaults to 20 if not specified.

value_schema.description: The number of results to be returned in each page. The value must be between 2 and 100. If not specified, the default value 20 will be used.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the ramp API.

parameters.name: from_date
parameters.description: Filter statements with end_date on or after this date (ISO8601 format).

value_schema.description: Filter statements with end_date on or after this date (ISO8601 format).

parameters.name: to_date
parameters.description: Filter statements with end_date on or before this date (ISO8601 format). Defaults to current time.

value_schema.description: Filter statements with end_date on or before this date (ISO8601 format). Defaults to current time.

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: The ID of the last entity of the previous page, used for pagination to get the next page.

value_schema.description: The ID of the last entity of the previous page, used for pagination to get the next page.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The number of results to be returned in each page. The value must be between 2 and 100. If not specified, the default value 20 will be used.

value_schema.description: The number of results to be returned in each page. The value must be between 2 and 100. If not specified, the default value 20 will be used.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
